mapper.select: SELECT r.ROUTINE_NUMBER, r.ROUTINE_LEADER_NUMBER, rl.ROUTINE_LEADER_NAME, r.ADMIN_NUMBER, r.ROUTINE_TITLE, r.ROUTINE_CONTENT, r.ROUTINE_STATUS_NUMBER, rs.ROUTINE_STATUS_INFO, r.ROUTINE_LOCATION, r.ROUTINE_CREATED_DATE, r.ROUTINE_UPDATED_DATE, r.ROUTINE_RECRUIT_START_DATE, r.ROUTINE_RECRUIT_END_DATE, r.ROUTINE_START_DATE, r.ROUTINE_END_DATE, r.ROUTINE_START_TIME, r.ROUTINE_END_TIME, r.ROUTINE_DAY_OF_WEEK, r.ROUTINE_RECRUIT_COUNT FROM tbl_routine r FULL OUTER JOIN tbl_routine_status rs ON r.ROUTINE_STATUS_NUMBER = rs.ROUTINE_STATUS_NUMBER FULL OUTER JOIN tbl_routine_leader rl ON r.ROUTINE_LEADER_NUMBER = rl.ROUTINE_LEADER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TBL_FILE_ROUTINE fr ON fr.ROUTINE_NUMBER = r.ROUTINE_NUMBER WHERE r.ROUTINE_NUMBER = #{routineNumber}
